channel.title: Latest Blog Posts on Beth's Genealogy Site
channel.description: Recent content in Latest Blog Posts on Beth's Genealogy Site

item.title: Jonathan Basile - Tar for Mortar
item.description: A text exists in what Borges calls an infinite dialogue with its recipients, and its endless recontextualization guarantees that even without a mark of difference every book, page, and even letter can differ from themselves. Our libraries do not fall short of universality because of a character we’ve left out, but because totality itself is essentially incomplete. Tar for Mortar

item.title: Some Tolkiens
item.description: John Ronald Reuel Tolkien is alleged to have fabricated the entirety of his Lord of the Rings novels. The Silmarillion, somehow, is all true.

item.title: Tolkien Ingalls Wilder
item.description: What if J.R.R.'s grandfather was H. Jon Benjamin? And J.R.R. was a homesteader in the Midwest?

item.title: Valar Extended Family
item.description: Manwë and Tolkien, J.R.R. spotted out in Heaven.

item.title: The Sea Was as Wet as Wet Can Be
item.description: I said her name once more, just for the record, and then I stood and turned from them and walked to the bluff. I rounded the bluff and the beach stretched before me, vast, smooth, empty, and remote.

item.title: Project No. 1
item.description: For a moment she'd wondered if the seal around her sockets were tight enough to allow the tears simply to go on and fill up the entire lens space and never dry. She could carry the sadness of the moment with her that way forever, see the world refracted through those tears, those specific tears, as if indices as yet unfound varied in important ways from cry to cry.

item.title: La Chute
item.description: “Men are never convinced of your reasons, of your sincerity, of the seriousness of your sufferings, except by your death. So long as you are alive, your case is doubtful; you have a right only to their skepticism.”

item.title: About
item.description: Me and my genes are on this site.

item.title: Beth's Ahnentafel
item.description: Spindler, Elisabeth Eleanor. Elisabeth Eleanor was born on 1988-11-09 in Pittsburgh, Allegheny, Pennsylvania, USA.

item.title: DAR
item.description: <!DOCTYPE html> Ancestral Report for Tolkien, John Ronald Reuel Ancestral Report for Tolkien, John Ronald Reuel Generation 1 1. Tolkien, John Ronald Reuel. (I0017) Son of Tolkien, Arthur Reuel and Suffield, Mabel. Born 1892 in Bloemfontein, Orange Free State. Died 1973 in Bournemouth, Hampshire, England (81 years). Relationship with Bratt, Edith. (F0009) Relationship with: Bratt, Edith. (I0024) Born 1889. Died 1971 (82 years). Children of Bratt, Edith and Tolkien, John Ronald Reuel
